channel.title: Need MAJOR help!
channel.description:
I have a server and when i log on then log out to change my run energy to like 999, after i do that i try to log in and it says error and my black box is running. and then i try to log in after it says error and it says my acc is alreayd logged in! wtF!!!! and i cant log in!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
next part is when i click on compile, it doesnt come up with the:
r- run your server c- compile your server. thingy
instead, it just comes up with the box and tells me: "'javac' is not reconised as i internal or external command, oporable program or batch files. press any key to continue..."
i press any key and then it just shuts down the box!
please tell me whast wrong !@!!!

item.title: Need MAJOR help!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

If you have that error again just add -

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
To your compiler.

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
To your runserver.bat if it has problems.

Note that the last line “pause” tells the box to not shut down.
Glad to help.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cookies_And_Cows wrote:

Ty gunztheduel…it worked lol
